main event: An unidentified flying object was observed in Portland, Oregon in June 1967.
interesting points: The object was described as flashing red and white with some blue colors., The object was estimated to be about 60 to 80 feet in diameter based on the size relative to a parked trailer., Witnesses reported the object moving slowly with a gentle rocking motion., The observation lasted for several minutes before the object faded away or went behind trees., The initial analysis concluded that there was insufficient data for scientific evaluation.
witness description: Various witnesses, including a 14-year-old female and other individuals who reported their observations.
